description: This file contains the declaration of a mock class 'PersistentStoreImplementationMock' used for unit testing, which implements multiple interfaces related to a persistent store system including caching, storage, and inspection. It utilizes Google Mock for mocking methods.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing storage and cache-related interfaces for unit testing purposes, utilizing Google Mock.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback for store changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair within a specific namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value for a specific key within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a specific key within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback for IStore2 interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a scoped value with a TTL in IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a scoped value and TTL in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a scoped key in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a scoped namespace in IStore2.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace.
